li.label: honored the sacred moons
li.description: I properly honored Jone and Jode in their eternal dance. The moons smile upon me.

li.label: respected moon-sugar
li.description: I treated the sacred moon-sugar with proper reverence, as the moons intended.

li.label: accepted all breeds
li.description: I showed proper respect for all children of the moons, regardless of their blessed form.

li.label: disrespected the moons
li.description: I failed to honor Jone and Jode properly. Their displeasure weighs heavily upon me.

li.label: wasted sacred moon-sugar
li.description: I allowed sacred moon-sugar to be wasted or abused. This is a grave offense to the moons.

li.label: conducted honest trade
li.description: I followed Riddle'Thar's teachings and conducted business with honesty and fairness.

li.label: showed family loyalty
li.description: I upheld my loyalty to family and clan, as Riddle'Thar commanded.

li.label: respected elder wisdom
li.description: I sought and respected the wisdom of my elders, following the ancient ways.

li.label: conducted dishonest trade
li.description: I betrayed the teachings of Riddle'Thar by engaging in dishonest commerce. My shame burns deep.

li.label: betrayed family loyalty
li.description: I failed in my loyalty to family and clan. This betrayal of Riddle'Thar's highest teaching torments me.

li.label: protected sacred felines
li.description: I protected the sacred feline forms blessed by Azurah. Her approval warms my spirit.

li.label: preserved ancient traditions
li.description: I helped preserve the ancient ways of our people, keeping Azurah's gifts alive.

li.label: accepted sacred transformation
li.description: I embraced the sacred gift of change and transformation that Azurah grants to all her children.

li.label: harmed sacred felines
li.description: I caused harm to the sacred feline forms blessed by Azurah. Her disappointment haunts me.

li.label: abandoned ancient traditions
li.description: I turned my back on the ancient ways and traditions. Azurah's gifts are being forgotten.

li.label: blessed by lunar cycles
li.description: The moons' influence flows through me, strengthening my natural abilities.

li.label: moon-sugar clarity
li.description: The sacred moon-sugar has opened my mind to the beauty of the lunar dance.

li.label: proud of my breed
li.description: I am proud of the form the moons blessed me with at birth. Each breed has its sacred purpose.
